oai_dc:dc.dc:title: William A. Dycus narrative
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Narrative of William A. Dycus, Co. D, 28th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA, as told to his daughter, Etta Dycus Hix. He refers to events that took place in November 1862 and discusses being under fire in Murfreesboro, Tenn., and retreating to Chickamauga. He speaks specifically of bloody battles in Georgia.
